Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory652.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As Luna approaches the top level, the "Gate", activated by the combined power of Selene and Agent Zero, reveals a dark tunnel stretching into the depths.'}
{3: 'One more step, and she can leap into another timeline...'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory920.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory920.jpg'}
{3: 'Yet, the fallen form continues to struggle against control.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'The girl lies half-crouched in the void, her face contorted, her breath ragged. Her body trembles uncontrollably, as if consciousness and flesh are at war.'}
{3: 'She strains forward, her right hand outstretched as if to grasp something, only for her left hand to plunge a blade through it.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "Two cries pierce the air, distinct and simultaneous. In that moment of confusion, the girl's form begins to shimmer and distort, like overlapping images out of focus."}
{2: 'Agent Zero', 3: 'Damn you, you tricked me!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: 'Merging in the Hetero Tower was your idea.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent Zero', 3: "This isn't a normal Hetero Tower! Something's wrong here—can't you feel it? We're losing power.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: "Isn't this exactly what you wanted? You chose this place to merge with the Ascension-Network and destroy Earth's civilization while there's still time.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'As soon as the words leave her lips, the girl twists the blade in her left hand, inflicting excruciating pain on both consciousnesses within the vessel.'}
{2: 'Agent Zero', 3: 'Aaaaah—!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: 'Yet your actions tell a different story. Time and again, you resist the transfer of power, even willing to risk mutual destruction to break free of our bond...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: "You're refusing to fulfill your duty.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Beneath Selene's calm exterior, a storm rages. Pain is a mere ripple on the surface of a still pond—she barely registers it."}
{3: "Just as Selene is about to strike again, they sense a presence on the horizon—Luna, approaching the tower's peak."}
{3: "Seeing this, Selene's tone grows even colder."}
{2: 'Selene', 3: 'Final offer: surrender your trait and return your consciousness to the Ascension-Network.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Agent Zero', 3: "You... won't... dare...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Agent Zero, though defiant, grows weaker.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziEndRed.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab'}
{3: 'The screams fade as Selene reasserts control. Gradually, her convulsions subside.'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: 'Agent Zero... Luna...', 4: '1'}
{3: "A strange expression crosses Selene's usually stoic face as she slowly rises, savoring each syllable of their names."}
{2: 'Selene', 3: "These thoughts are meaningless, overcomplicated, and redundant. The Ascension-Network has no use for such consciousnesses—they're dead weight.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: 'Let\'s start over, Luna. Become the "key" that unlocks the past. Return me to the moment you first logged into the Ascension-Network.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: 'I will correct your understanding and clarify your purpose. Only pure emotions can transcend the Filtering, and hatred is the most potent emotion of all.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Selene raises her head to look at the girl who has fought so hard to reach this place, and offers her a cold, twisted "kindness."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selene', 3: 'The Ascension-Network was designed for hatred and vengeance. You should know that all living humans are inherently treacherous and despicable.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selene', 3: 'Come, Luna. When you awaken, the world will hear your cry of rage.', 4: '1'}
